title: Neck of lamb with lemon and thyme
description: Neck of lamb is a cheaper cut of meat, but no less delicious if cooked long and slow with plenty of seasoning.
ingredients: 1kg/2¼lb scrag end of neck of lamb, on the bone, or chops from the neck end, or both
juice of 1½  lemons, plus a little thinly pared rind
a wine glass of water, or lamb stock
salt and fresh ground black pepper
